014package org.jdbi.v3.core.internal;
015
016import java.util.function.Supplier;
017
018// Thanks Holger!
019// https://stackoverflow.com/questions/35331327/does-java-8-have-cached-support-for-suppliers
020public class MemoizingSupplier<T> implements Supplier<T> {
021    private final Supplier<T> create;
022
023    private Supplier<T> delegate = this::init;
024    private boolean initialized;
025
026    private MemoizingSupplier(Supplier<T> create) {
027        this.create = create;
028    }
029
030    public static <T> MemoizingSupplier<T> of(Supplier<T> supplier) {
031        return new MemoizingSupplier<>(supplier);
032    }
033
034    @Override
035    public T get() {
036        return delegate.get();
037    }
038
039    private T init() { // NOPMD
040        synchronized (this) {
041            if (!initialized) {
042                T result = create.get();
043                initialized = true;
044                delegate = () -> result;
045            }
046            return delegate.get();
047        }
048    }
049}
